RandomDataFrame.KitText: #> RandomDataFrame --columnCount 3 --rowCount 10 --exampleTitle Generate a Custom-Sized Random DataFrame --example Generates a lightweight dataframe with 3 columns and 10 rows. Useful for demoing logic, formatting, or functionality in a quick and controlled setup.
RandomDataFrame.ExampleDescription: Generates a lightweight dataframe with 3 columns and 10 rows. Useful for demoing logic, formatting, or functionality in a quick and controlled setup.
